t: Who can create a Brand Store?

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 12 hours ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million.
